Class com.TeamJava.PaddleWars.ball extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

center

java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double center
Stores the center location of the ball.

r

int r
Stores the radius of the ball.

xM

int xM
Stores the x-movmement speed of the ball.

yM

int yM
Stores the y-movmement speed of the ball.

Speed

int Speed
Stores the variable speed of the ball. Ball Speeed * xM = the actual x speed of the ball.

Size

int Size
Stores the variable size of the ball. BallSize * r = the actual ball size.

BallType

int BallType
Stores what type of ball this is, gameBall, Bonus Ball, or Missile.

bounces

int bounces
Stores how many times a bonus ball can hit a wall before it dissapears.

MissileExploded

int MissileExploded
Stores how many times a missile can hit a wall before it explodes.

Delay

int Delay
Stores how long the ball should pause before moving again each time it starts up.

Ball

java.awt.Image[] Ball
Stores the ball's image. Not relevant with bonus balls.

cycle

int cycle
Stores where abouts in the frame delay the class currently is.

frame

int frame
Stores which frame the ball animation is at.

Color

java.awt.Color[] Color
Stores the colour of the ball, only relevant with bonus balls.

BonusType

int BonusType
Stores what bonus type a bonus ball is.

WallHit

java.applet.AudioClip WallHit
The audio clip to play when the ball hits a wall.

aWidth

int aWidth
Stores the width of the area the ball is to be within.

aHeight

int aHeight
Stores the height of the area the ball is to be within.

arrayNumber

int arrayNumber
Stores Which element in anarray the ball is. Only relevant for missiles, to be able to reset the appropriate one.

See Also:
paddleWars

Player

int Player
Which player is the owner of the missile. Only relevant with missiles.

Class com.TeamJava.PaddleWars.paddle extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

WhichPaddle

int WhichPaddle
Stores which paddle this is, in terms of its array posistion in the PaddleWars paddles variable.

See Also:
PaddleWars

paddle

java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double paddle
Stores the top left location of the paddle.

java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double size
Stores the fixed size of the x and y size of the paddle.

pSizeY

int pSizeY
Stores the variable y size of the paddle.

pSizeX

int pSizeX
Stores the variable x size of the paddle.

PaddleImage

java.awt.Image[] PaddleImage
Stores the array of Images of the paddle, which form its animation.

frame

int frame
Stores which frame the paddle's image animation is up to, in terms of which picture in the PaddleImage array.

Ecycle

int Ecycle
Stores how many times in the threads cycle, that a image in the Paddle animation cycle has been displayed. This is to slow down the animation.

Pcycle

int Pcycle
Stores how many times in the threads cycle, that a image in the Explosion animation cycle has been displayed. This is to slow down the animation.

animationTimer

int animationTimer
Stores for how long an image in the animation cycle for the paddle should be displayed.

Explosion

java.awt.Image[] Explosion
Stores the images needed for the explosion animation.

ExpFrame

int ExpFrame
Stores which frame the explosion's image animation is up to, in terms of which picture in the Explosion array.

expFlag

boolean expFlag
A flag to tell if the explosion should run or not.

expSpot

java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double expSpot
The spot at which the explosion animation should occur.

int aHeight
Stores the y size or height of the applet.
